title: gd to your knowledge is this a good/decent computer monitor
body:
https://www.bestbuy.ca/en-ca/product/lg-electronics-lg-22-fhd-60hz-5ms-gtg-tn-led-monitor-22m38d-b-aus-black-22m38d-b-aus/10440824.aspx
not too sure what I should be looking for but I assume that there must be more to the price of monitors than just the size? 
so yeah quality/price is that decent compared to our modern standarts? 

this is what I had until it stopped working this week
http://www.lg.com/ca_en/desktop-monitors/lg-W2061TQ-PF-lcd-monitor
most of the specs that are in both descriptions appear to be similar, and the one I had is several years old, so... 
is that a bad thing?
